intro: Clutia platyphylla, commonly known as the broad-leaved clutia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa and Asia. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant typically grows as an erect shrub with opposite, ovate leaves that are usually smooth and glossy. Its small, white to pale yellow flowers are clustered in cymes and bloom during the rainy season. The plant is often used in traditional medicine for its purported healing properties.
